column1: The Purple Pig////I think the main reason why I give The Purple Pig 4 stars instead of 5 is because while some of the dishes were outstanding
column2: some of them had unsuccessful components which didn't match the dish. Consistency is paramount
column4: I would definitely recommend going to The Purple Pig. Since this is a tapas place
column5: three groups can have three completely different meals
column6: and they could all be different. Just with my particular dishes
column7: there wasn't consistency across the board. Still would go back
